pr_title: GEODE-7886 Update strings tests to cover sad as well as happy paths

timeline.message: Update strings tests to cover sad as well as happy paths

timeline.bodyText: This class was renamed to KeyHashIdentifier on develop - I think you may have inadvertently picked this up during a merge. It can be deleted.
timeline.author: jdeppe-pivotal

timeline.bodyText: There are a couple of these comments. Since all of these good changes are already being applied to this class, is there any reason not to validate these remaining few tests? Or is this more work than what it appears on the surface?
timeline.author: jdeppe-pivotal

replies.bodyText: I think this story had gone on a bit longer than was originally planned and the scope kept expanding, so creating stories to go back and review the implementation/tests for the commands that weren't part of this release was a way of reining in the scope.  @ringles may be able to provide more context though.
replies.author: sabbey37

replies.bodyText: The issue is that there are higher-priority commands that need love and attention before we circle back to these. There are stories in the backlog for them, but they aren't our current top priority.
replies.author: ringles
